item.title: Luxury hotel to cater to Sydney airport guests
item.description:
Accor, the largest hotel operator in Australia, will be a part of a new multi-use development project in Mascot, near the Sydney Airport. The project will include a hotel, commercial space, and retail areas. Accor signed an agreement with Goodman to oversee a 5-star hotel, named Pullman Sydney Airport, as part of a new A$100 million development. This project will also include office and retail space. Pullman, the biggest upscale hotel network in the Asia Pacific, has over 45 hotels in the area...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/luxury-hotel-to-cater-to-sydney-airport-guests/
